    Intervals.analyzedText(String text, Analyzer analyzer, String field, int maxGaps, boolean ordered)
    Returns intervals that correspond to tokens from a TokenStream returned for text by applying the provided Analyzer as if text was the content of the given field.

    A fuzzy term IntervalsSource matches the disjunction of intervals of terms that are within the specified maxEdits from the provided term.
